title: Lisa Bonet
summary: Lilakoi Moon[1] (born Lisa Michelle Bonet; November 16, 1967), known professionally as Lisa Bonet[2][3][4] (/boʊˈneɪ/[5]), is an American actress, who is known for playing Denise Huxtable[6] on the sitcom The Cosby Show (1984–1992) and its spinoff series A Different World (1987–1993), which earned her a nomination for the Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Supporting Actress in a Comedy Series.
